name: Ideology
steps: Each civilization will be able to choose an Ideology upon reaching the Modern Era, or controlling 3 Factories.

civilopediaText.text: Reach the Modern Era to unlock your Ideology
Alternatively, own 3 Factories to unlock your Ideology

Great Works are the exceptional creations of Great People. They can also be acquired via conquest, however, or after your civilization develops its interest in ancient Artifacts and starts digging them up from the ruins of the past.
There are four types of Great Works:
Once you have acquired a Great Work or an Arifact, you are able to slot it into one of the Great Works slots in your cites:
Great Work of Art Slot, which can also slot Artifacts
Great Works are one of the primary means in which to acquire Tourism
